field.name: summary
field.value: Patch for SmtpSender to enable multiple CC and BCC recipients

field.name: description
field.value: I needed the ability to cc and bcc my email messages to multiple addresses. The patch that I am supplying provides the ability to set the Bcc and Cc properties of a Message to a delimited list of addresses, separated by semi-colons or commas.

comment.author: roelofb
comment.text:
Thanks for the patch, Steve.
We are using tabs instead of spaces, currently your patch is doing a lot of unnecessary modifications because it's using spaces. Would you be so kind to provide a new one that's using tabs?

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text:
Steve, I hope you don't mind but I changed your patch to adhere to the Castle coding standards(use tabs instead of spaces). Also, changed it slightly to use the .Net API to do the split of multiple addresses instead of doing it in our code. Roelof, have a look at my patch, let me know of any problems.
Cheers John
